channel.title: Im confised on how to g zip stuff

item.title: Im confised on how to g zip stuff
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:6, topic:275428”][quote author=Mod Gamer link=topic=363842.msg2762922#msg2762922 date=1240638039]
Couldnt say it any better ;D
[/quote]
Yes you could.

Just use the actual GZip exeutable. Download it from here.
You then call the packager in a bacth file like this:

 gzip *.dat

Lol that is better.

Read full topic

item.title: Im confised on how to g zip stuff
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Gamer Mod Gamer
item.description:
@Mod_Gamer wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:4, topic:275428”]When you open the 7zFM next to the Archive Format there will be a seclection of endings such as Tar,7z and it has a few more.
Put it as 7z and hit “OK” and wait for you’re file to be G-Zipped. When Finished cheat you’re Window and see if it has a folder with a zip down
the middle.

Good Luck.[/quote]

Couldnt say it any better ;D

Read full topic
item.source: Im confised on how to g zip stuff

item.title: Im confised on how to g zip stuff
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

When you open the 7zFM next to the Archive Format there will be a seclection of endings such as Tar,7z and it has a few more.
Put it as 7z and hit “OK” and wait for you’re file to be G-Zipped. When Finished cheat you’re Window and see if it has a folder with a zip down
the middle.

Good Luck.

Read full topic
